ResourceHeader.ResourceName: NASA THEMIS GBO Goose Bay Station
ResourceHeader.Description:
Goose Bay (GBAY) station is located in Goose Bay, NL, Canada. GBAY is part of the UCLA GBO Network.
Magnetic Latitude: 61.7 Magnetic Longitude: 383.30 UT of Magnetic Midnight: 3.6000 Magnetic Declination: -23.11
Magnetic coordinates obtained by calculation using the CCGM online calculator with IGRF 2008 at altitude of 0 km. Magnetic declination obtained using CCGM online calculator with IGRF 2007
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: We acknowledge NASA contract NAS5-02099 and V. Angelopoulos for use of data from the THEMIS Mission. Specifically:S. Mende and C. T. Russell for use of the GMAG data
